phrases: Nana!
I thought I might find you here.
He is so cool.
Matsushida the DJ!
Super cool!
Super nice!
If you like him, just tell him so.
If you are lucky, he may make you his girlfriend.
No way.
Matsushida is very popular with the ladies
and I will bet he fools around a lot.
Rumors are that he changes women all the time.
He is so full of himself.
I am sure of it.
An enemy of women.
Then do not fall in love with him.
I like the way you said that.
Your comeback line.
You are starting to sound a lot like Jun-chan.
Should I call you Sho-chan?
Everyone would become like this after hanging out with you!
But Jun-chan does not talk to me the same way now.
She is been so preoccupied with Kyosuke, her personality is softening.
Like she is boneless.
She lacks something now.
But it is all right.
I have you now, Shoji.
So I am merely Junko's replacement, I guess.
By the way, Sho-chan, why did you come looking for me?
Is it something urgent?
Do not call me Sho-chan!
I was at a bar drinking with Kyosuke and Junko,
and thought I would invite you.
You may get upset if you thought we deliberately went drinking without you.
Yes!
Let us go, let us go!
Let us drink!
You know, we seem to always end up drinking.
For once, I would like to try something more refreshing, like go to the beach.
The beach?
Hey, summer vacation's coming up.
Why do not the four of us go on a trip somewhere?
- The beach! - The beach!
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
The beach is really nice.
This is what youth is all about.
I am tired of the mountains.
Yeah, I have also grown tired of watching the mountains.
I am really sleepy.
Really, Jun-chan?
Then I guess we should get going.
What are you saying, Nana?
You are in this room with Junko.
I will give my place to Kyosuke.
I am going to sleep with Shoji.
Huh?!
Wh-What are you saying?
Come on.
You have got to be more considerate, Shoji?
Hey!
Hurry up, let us go.
Well, I guess there was nothing to worry about, after all.
You think it will be that simple?
What are you thinking?
It is really okay.
There are two beds, and I will not assault you, so do not worry.
I can even sing you a lullaby like your grandmother.
Never mind!
You may be fine with this, but I am not!
I might force myself on you!
Why?
Why, she says...
We are friends, right?
Nana, you really have no clue about men.
A guy can do it with a girl even if he has no feelings of love for her.
I know that.
But I believed that you were not like those types of guys.
Jun-chan even guaranteed it.
I am afraid that I am like that!
I do not know what Junko guaranteed you...
Hey, why are you crying?
Because I really like you, Shoji,
but you say things that make me lose interest in you!
Ah, say, Nana.
When you say you like me, you mean as a friend, right?
That is right.
You are the most precious guy friend I have.
I like you not as the male species, but as a human being!
But you are right.
Since you are a member of the male species,
it may be dangerous to be sleeping in the same room.
I was mistaken.
It is hard for a guy and a girl to be friends, right, Sho-chan?
But we will do our best.
Well then, I would better be going back to my own room.
Wait, Nana!
That is not a good idea!
Huh?
They are probably in the middle of... you know...
Oh, right!
What should I do?
When do you think they will be done?
Do not ask me.
We have got a problem.
All right, I have got it, Nana.
Sleep right there!
Huh?
I will sleep in this bed.
No, Shoji!
It is dangerous!
No need to worry!
Why is that?
You said a moment ago that you lost interest in me, right?
I need to regain that trust that I lost!
For the sake of our friendship!
Good night!
Shoji...
I love you!
Go to sleep, little baby Go to sleep, my child
You do not have to sing!
It is not a laughing matter.
Man.
Thanks to that, I did not get any sleep at all.
Very well done, Sho-chan.
Do not call me, Sho-chan.
Take good care of Nana from now on too, okay?
Yeah, yeah.
Although we are just friends.
Now I can go to Tokyo without worry.
Jun-chan!
Come in!
Let us swim together!
Okay, okay.
If you try to tan too much at once, you will regret it later.
Kyosuke, is Junko going to Tokyo?
Yeah.
So you heard.
Why?
To do what?
It is not just a trip?
She is going to apply to an art school in Tokyo next year.
Even if she does not get in, she will go to prep school.
Junko should be able to get in, no problem.
But are you okay with this?
Why can you remain so cool?
Why?
Because I am going too.
No!
No!
No!
No!
Do not go, Jun-chan!
Are not you going to stop me?
You are right!
If Kyosuke decides not to go, Jun-chan will not go either.
Do not go, Kyosuke!
Enough already, Nana!
Even if Kyosuke were not going, I would still go!
I want to devote myself to studying art
at an art school in Tokyo!
It is my life!
You cannot tell me what to do!
I am sorry.
You are right.
It is exactly as you say, Jun-chan.
But I am going to be so lonely.
I will be even sadder than I was on that snowy day.
You know, Nana...
I want to go to Tokyo and try and get into an art school as well.
Why do not you do the same?
Huh?
No way!
Awesome!
I never knew there were so many art schools in Tokyo!
I am sure I will get accepted into some place.
Yeah.
Why not apply to all of them?
Even if I do not get in a university
I can go to a specialty college again.
What do you mean by that?
What meaning would it have to do such a thing?
It is my life!
You cannot tell me what to do!
Ouch!
But...
I want to go to Tokyo with everyone else!
Do as you wish.
Why should I care how your life ends up?
Jun-chan!
I just abandoned you.
Why does that make you happy?
I must do my best!
No more staying out late!
No more clubbing!
Drop dead, Demon Lord!
No alcohol My goal: Tokyo
No more staying out late!
No more clubbing!
Drop dead, Demon Lord!
No alcohol My goal: Tokyo Farewell, DJ Matsushida!
Farewell, DJ Matsushida!
I have no time to be thinking about love.
When I get to Tokyo,
I will see many handsome men walking the streets...
This is the beginning of our wonderful Tokyo life, Jun-chan!
I guess life does not always work out as planned.
But why?
I studied so hard and yet I failed them all.
I knew it, it is my cursed fate!
Do not blame your fate for it.
It is fine for you two, Jun-chan.
You got into your university, so you can play all you want this spring.
I am not going to university to have fun!
But Nana, it does not hafta be a university for you, right?
A specialty college will do, right?
My parents tell me they are only paying tuition
if I were going to university.
Then you will hafta wait a full year from spring.
But I do not want to go to art university desperately enough to wait a year.
What in heavens should I do?
Hey, should not we be heading back to the hotel?
I want to get up early tomorrow and visit a few real estate agents.
You are right.
Nana, since we have come all the way here to Tokyo,
want to try another shop?
Yes!
Which shop would be nice?
Sorry!
Go on ahead without us.
Okay.
But do not drink too much.
You never stop worrying, do you?
Tokyo is quite the place.
It is this late at night, but there are so many people.
I feel like such a country girl.
You are a country girl.
But more importantly, do not you think the correct choice for you
would be to continue at the local art school from April?
But I want to come to Tokyo, no matter what.
I kind of feel responsible for this.
I brought it up, after all.
But you know, you are better off staying back home.
Absolutely not!
Do you want to be with Junko that much?
But...
But you are going to Tokyo too, are not you, Shoji?
Actually, I think I will remain here and commute to prep school,
and then try to get in again next year.
Then I am coming to Tokyo to live here, too!
I do not need my parents to pay for my living expenses.
I will work freelance or whatever,
and prove that I can survive on my own!
You are being ridiculous!
Do not try and overdo things.
I am not overdoing it.
I will be all right.
I will show you that I can make it.
Do you have enough money to get by without getting an allowance from home?
Like I said, I will get a job!
What about rent money?
You are going to need a few hundred thousand yen upfront.
You are not a kid, so you should know that much.
Think of things a little more realistically, will ya?!
Then I will go to prep school too.
That way my parents might give me money.
What do you mean by that?
You cannot go to prep school for that reason.
What should I do then?
I am telling you, stay back home.
You are not going to be lonely without me, Shoji?
I will not be lonely at all!
I will be relieved!
What am I to you?!
The way you become all tearful,
say things to make me think you like me...
Is it so much fun to mess with my heart?!
All you are looking for is a guy next to you,
who you can cuddle up to on your terms!
What male-female friendship?
Give me a break!
I hafta get back to the hotel.
But I do not know my way back.
I have always relied on Shoji,
so I never paid attention to where we were going.
I have purposely tried not to watch the road.
It seems that I have fallen into the pits.
Where am I standing now?
Nana.
That is right.
I am in Tokyo.
But... it cannot be.
I knew it.
What is the matter?
What are you doing here?
It is over.
Because!
She was being so unreasonable!
I got upset!
I can see why.
It is natural for you to get upset.
But to just leave her there?
I am disappointed in you, Shoji!
Well, the streets are well lit during night.
She should be able to get back here alone.
That is not the point!
You shut up.
It is come to this, so I will tell you.
Shoji, Nana is in love with you.
That is not possible.
Imagine how hurt she would be,
being told those things from the man she loves.
Think it through, and act on it!
To be honest, I did sorta suspect that.
But I figured that was just wishful thinking.
What do you mean?
Hey, if Junko's telling you, then you know it is true.
See what happens when you act before you think?
I see.
You applied to art schools here.
But I failed to enter all of them.
I am not sure what to do now.
I had my heart set on coming Tokyo.
But it was not like I came to search you down or anything.
I am not a stalker, so do not worry, okay?
You have not changed, Nana.
What?
No way!
I did change.
My hairstyle, my clothes...
more like a kid than when I was in high school.
I am pretty embarrassed having you see me like this.
That suits you better, Nana.
Y-You think so too?
But the way you speak has not changed at all.
I will not because you trouble, Mr. Asano.
I will not stalk you.
Do not worry.
You would say it every time we met.
I felt uneasy every time you said it.
Why?
You have not changed at all either.
Every time I would ask what is wrong I would get no reply.
I felt uneasy every time that happened.
Is that so?
Well, I am sorry.
It is such a strange feeling.
I thought I really hated this man.
But now that we meet I have trouble hating him.
I should stop thinking that this was a lie.
I loved him with all my heart.
And at one time, he gracefully accepted my feelings.
That is good enough.
It is something to be thankful for, is not it?
I should not be sad about it.
Right.
I know now.
I recognize this corner.
Just go straight and you will get to your hotel.
Huh?
Mr. Asano!
What are you doing here so late?
And alone with a young girl?!
I am going to tell your pretty wife.
Then I would better treat you to something next time to keep you quiet.
Yes!
I am looking forward to it.
See you.
Should not you be making some excuse?
There is no need to worry.
He was just kidding.
If I tried to defend myself, that in itself would make him suspicious.
I see.
But he dealt with that guy so calmly and swiftly.
Is he used to this adultery stuff?
But that was your real name, after all.
I am glad.
Huh?
No, I was just talking to myself.
Well then, I will be on my way now.
Do not you ever cheat on your wife again!
I will be careful.
Very well.
Not that I should be the one telling you.
Goodbye, Mr. Asano.
I really...
loved you.
I am all right.
There will be no more tears.
What a stupid ring tone?
That ruins the mood.
Yes, Nana here.
What?
You are in high spirits.
Kyosuke?
Judging from your cheerfulness, I guess he found you, did he?
Wh-Who?
So he did not find you.
Well, it was not likely.
Where are you now?
I-I thought he meant Mr. Asano.
I am right by the hotel.
I will be there in a bit.
About an hour ago,
Shoji and Junko got all concerned and went out looking for you.
If they find you, it would be like some TV drama.
That could be fun.
Is it so much fun to mess with my heart?!
I am sorry.
I did not mean for this to happen.
Well, do not apologize to me.
And do not cry to me.
But,.,!
It is all right.
Shoji is in love with you.
Liar!
You are the one who is lying, and you know it.
Kyosuke...
Where do you think Shoji is now?
Who knows?
I imagine he is within walking distance.
Anyway, just come back to the hotel...
No luck, Kyosuke!
I cannot find her!
It would be quicker trying to reach her on her cell phone!
So you finally realized.
The truth is I always loved him.
From that first time I saw him, I liked him.
But at that time, I was battered pretty badly.
I may have selfishly labeled myself as a victim,
but I was hurting all over, just the same.
I was afraid.
Afraid that if I got involved, my scar would spread.
Whenever I am with you, Shoji, I always felt healed.
You hugged me gently with all your heart, did not you?
Right now, I want you to embrace me with that warmth,
with all your strength.
Shoji...
Shoji!
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
